attributes.action: increase the age where a pupil has to make decisions about their edumacation that will effect the rest of their lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present you can mess your life up before you've even left school, so this petition is to shed light onto the fact that it is preposterous to think that, even with parents that care, a most people in the teens have any idea whatsoever what they wnat to do the following day, ket alone the rest of their lives.  Obviously the knock on effects of this petition are immense but  it needs discussion. The world has change but education has not progressed much beyond the stylus and wax tablet.
I thank you.
